It is characterized by its striking, waxy leaves that exhibit a range of colors from deep green to vibrant red, depending on the light conditions. The plant produces small, delicate flowers that bloom in clusters, often in shades of white and pink. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot.
